sentences.en: The brutality of the crime has appalled the public.
sentences.cn: 罪行之残暴使公众大为震惊。

sentences.en: Her experience of men was of domination and brutality.
sentences.cn: 男人留给她的感受是支配一切，野蛮残暴。

sentences.en: He moves dangerously through a world of ruthless gangs, brutality, a vicious lust for power and money.
sentences.cn: 他在一个充满了残忍帮派、暴行、对权力和金钱有着邪恶欲望的世界里危险地移动。
